detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract CoreTToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreTToken.sol#71-184) has payable functions:
	 - CoreTToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreTToken.sol#181-183)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
